name: Chaos Kingdom (itch)
description:
Hi my name is Zentaya and this is the game I created for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

It is a choice management game where you try to make your kingdom a better place while maintaining all its needs. The goal of the game is to max out one of the four main stats. Pretty simple, but there is a twist. There is a fifth stat that makes a game more chaotic if not managed properly. Since it's a Game Jam game it might seem a bit unbalanced, but I hope you will enjoy it anyway.
